title: Ever since latest patch, having problems logging in
body:
As the title suggests,... i get past the authentication but get stuck on the logging on bit, then get this message.
Any suggestions appreciated.
My computer working fine for everything else including my internet and never had this problem before.

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey Pat, 

Have you tried the solutions on the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article? If not, please do so and let me know how it turns out.

Thanks for your help.  I have put in the port settings and are now able to log in.  Thank you thank you thank you!
Hopefully you wont hear from me again
Awesome, glad to hear it! Don't hesitate to give me a nudge if you need anything else, and feel more than free to pop by the Boards every now and then xD

I am getting the same Message as above, Have repatched twice and reinstalled... still getting it

RIOT PLZ HELP
I have the same problem never happened before either
Do you get the same message ?
yes the same message. i have tried repatching twice and am now going to reinstall

I wasnt sure if it was my computer so i installed league on our other home pc and nope , could not log onto that either s so I knew it had to be at Riot's end .

Anyways,  tried it again this am and can now log in .  Hopefully this problem is resolved.

Nope, after day of working, Im back to getting the same above message.

Riot plz, what is going on?

have tried all the suggestions at Riot support login... but nope.
Maybe my computer will break my Lol addiction for me :)
